articles.author: Elizabeth Blackstock
articles.title: Four surprising things Ferrari film gets right about the legendary Enzo - Planet F1
articles.description: Despite some Hollywood story license, director Michael Mann did a superb job nailing down some of the finer details about Enzo Ferrari.
articles.content: Ferrari, a new film directed by Michael Mann, follows Enzo Ferrari (played by Adam Driver) during three months of the 1957 race season; though it focuses on the final running of the Mille Miglia, the… [+4533 chars]
